Description: Explore the Basilica of Bom Jesus, a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its baroque architecture.
Try the local Goan cuisine at Vinayak Family Restaurant in Old Goa.
Visit the Se Cathedral, one of the largest churches in Asia.
Stroll along Miramar Beach and enjoy the sunset.
Dine at Mum's Kitchen for authentic Goan flavors.
Relax at a beach shack on Miramar Beach with some live music.
Head to Aguada Fort for a historical tour and panoramic views of the Arabian Sea.
Enjoy seafood specialties at Fisherman's Wharf in Cavelossim.
Visit Sinquerim Beach for sunbathing and water sports like parasailing.
Shop for souvenirs at the Calangute Market.
Experience Goan-Portuguese fusion cuisine at Gunpowder in Assagao.
Enjoy a vibrant nightlife experience at Tito's Club in Baga.
Embark on an adventure with a trek to Dudhsagar Waterfalls.
Have a picnic lunch at the base of the waterfalls.
Continue exploring the lush surroundings of the Bhagwan Mahavir Wildlife Sanctuary.
Relax and unwind at Cola Beach, known for its scenic beauty.
Visit Martin's Corner in Betalbatim for a mix of Goan and Indian cuisine.
Enjoy a quiet night by the beach with a bonfire at Palolem Beach.
Explore the historical Reis Magos Fort with its captivating river views.
Savor Goan thali at Anandashram in Panaji.
Visit the Goa State Museum for a cultural and historical insight into the region.
Take a relaxing Mandovi River Cruise with live Goan music and dance performances.
Indulge in a fine dining experience at The Black Sheep Bistro in Panaji.
Try your luck at the Deltin Royale Casino, a popular floating casino in Goa.
Spend the morning at Anjuna Beach, famous for its vibrant atmosphere and watersports.
Enjoy a meal at Curlies Beach Shack, a popular spot at Anjuna Beach.
Visit the Anjuna Flea Market for some last-minute shopping and local crafts.
Watch the sunset at Chapora Fort, offering stunning views of the coastline.
Dine at Vinayak Family Restaurant in Assagao for traditional Goan dishes.
End your trip with a relaxing evening at a beach party in Anjuna.
